unnormalised: New Delhi: As demand for Indian-made goods surges, manufacturers are increasingly prioritizing stringent quality control measures to maintain competitiveness. Experts at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi recently hosted a workshop on Six Sigma methodologies for SMEs in the manufacturing sector.
